Games.2: My first contact with programming was in 2019, starting with Digital game development. At this stage, I started coding in C# and that was the moment i learned about .NET and OOP (Object Oriented Programming), all of this in unity.

BioDescription.1: I'm a very high-spirited person, I like to make things always fun and comfortable for all around me, I also like to learn always more, so when someone shows me a new tool, frameworks, new programming languages or new contents I always give my attention, because all knowledge will be welcome. Sinse I was a child I love technology and I have always been facinated about this world. At first I wanted to work with robots, until I found the programming area and ended up enjoying using code much more. My first contact with programming was in 2019 with digital game development, but I went deeper in 2021 when I started studying at
BioDescription.2: . Today I am a Full-stack web developer and I intend to continue growing and improving my knowledge.

CvDescription.4: Monitoring students in the learning process of Front-end Development technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript e React; Leadership of teams of monitors in order to direct them to give the best assistance to the devs. Back-end helped to create APIs using NodeJs and Prisma.

CvDescription.11: My relationship with technology started in 2019 and since then I've been looking to learn and evolve more and more in this area because it's what I really like to do. My goal is to work as a full-stack developer.

Initial.1: Welcome to my Site, here you can view all my projects and activities done so far. My intention is to show you my evolution over time as a developer, also bringing the freedom for you to know a little more about me. Welcome to my home!
